…Speaker, I rise today in full support of H.R. 789, the  Transparency and Predictability in Small Business Opportunities Act,  introduced by Representatives Latimer, Alford, and Mfume.

H.R. 789 seeks to bring clarity to small business owners when  solicitations for contracts are canceled. Often, small businesses  devote a considerable amount of time and…

…restoring fairness in Federal contracting and rebuilding the  relationship between our government and the small businesses it is  supposed to serve.
